explains: n. 条件，情况，环境；境况，经济状况；详情，原委；命运，境遇
wordGroup: in the circumstances 在这种情况下；既然这样
under the circumstance 在这种情况下
under no circumstance 在任何情况下都不
under certain circumstance adv. 在某种情况下

sentences.en: I know I can trust her in any circumstance.
sentences.cn: 我知道我在任何情况下都能信任她。

sentences.en: In every moment and every circumstance, you can choose to have fuller, richer life by setting a clear intention.
sentences.cn: 在任何时刻、在任何情况下，你都可以通过设定一个明确的目标来选择更充实、更丰富的生活。

sentences.en: It is their sensitive response to human circumstance that accounts for the persistence of certain universal ideas.
sentences.cn: 他们对人类环境的敏感反应解释了某些普遍观点的持久性。
